text: We will drive them from our lands
We will drive them from our lands
They can join our warriors in battle
Focus on gifts for the King
Focus on weapons for the army
Focus on tools for the workers
Allow the foreigners in our ports
Allow the foreigners in our ports
We will hire some of them
We have no need of mercenaries
They may stay if they fight
The Conqueror is in the South
The enemy lives to fight another day
The eyes of Haraldr are upon us
The Welsh will not bother us, for now.
The Sons of Rhodri unite against us.
Powis will declare war on Mierce next spring
The Sons of Rhodri attack Mierce!
The Sons of Rhodri attack each other!
King gains Relic: Bones of Sir Oswald
